availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Melinda Mahoney. Father of Henry Mahoney, Sarah Jane Mahoney, and Elizabeth Mahoney. Farmer in Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, pp. 411A & B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 281.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Drennons Ridge Precinct Subdivision 63, p. 273A.
